title: D&A Coaching
text_array: D&A Coaching is a website which helps the customers in acquisition of necessary information about certain topics connected to fitness and coaching.
I developed a forum with custom topics, newsletter subscription and support emailing service.
Used HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 4, JavaScript, Node.js and Ajax.

title: My Barber
text_array: My Barber helps foreigners and tourists with finding a barbershop in their area and with reserving appointments. It helps barbershops with managing their services, appointments and the locations.
I developed the front‑end and appointment booking parts of the website.
As a team lead I had to create the presentation and to present the project.
Used PHP with CodeIgniter, MySQL and XAMPP Server with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap 5.

title: Turbo Wash
text_array: Turbo Wash is a desktop application that helps the car washing company with their car washing and cleaning appointments.

I developed the whole application. User login and register, the car wash appointment creation and display of users appointments. As well as email notifications for registration of accounts and new appointments.
Used C# with Windows forms and SQL with the Microsoft SQL Server.

title: Genetic algorithms
text_array: We developed a Road network agent‑based traffic simulator. It simulates the road network traffic of the Koper city. I developed the construction of the intersections.
I developed multiple Genetic Algorithms for optimization of the road network. By changing the types of intersections with the help of GAs I was attempting to improve traffic flow.
Used Java with libraries for the project and R for thesis graphs.

title: Other projects
text_array: My portfolio website (this website). I used Threejs for the 3d scene and React.js with SASS for all other sections and components.
Button game is a desktop game in which user has to paint all of the buttons into one color. Used only Java.
Udemy course project. I made an e-commerce website with React and Firebase by following the Udemy tutorial.

My Fridge: GDSC (Google Developer Student Clubs) Hackaton. We developed the My Fridge web application for minimizing food waste. I developed a web crawler which obtains recipes and ingredients from an other website at the rate of ∼ 4 milliseconds per recipe.
